website_summaries.verdict: An oversize umbrella with a double venting system to help it hold up well in the storm.
pros: Very strong construction but also lightweight
Graphite rod frame keeps the canopy sturdy
Two straps hold it closed when not in use
cons: This umbrella doesn't fold up small

customer_reviews.title: Leaking Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I received the umbrella yesterday and used it today for the first time. I’m not impressed. Less than an hour in the rain and most of the mesh under the canopy is wet. Water is dripping off the ribs and running down the shaft. This umbrella may be good for sun protection, but fails for rain protection.
customer_reviews.author: OctoberGlory

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second umbrella from Procella and it is a winner! Beautifully made, I really like how the wind proofing has been done, there is a mesh to hold the crown flaps in place, one of the problems with the flaps is that when the wind lifts the flaps rain pours in, with the mesh it prevents that from happening! Great design from Procella. I look forward to many years of service from my new umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: beeperbeak

customer_reviews.title: Not really a golf umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is too short. When I mount it on my push cart I have to duck to get under it. Material is not reflective and the heat from the sun gets through. Probably a good umbrella but doesn't function well as a golf umbrella like the ones I had before this.
customer_reviews.author: RodF

customer_reviews.title: An umbrella that works
customer_reviews.text: While I've only had to rely on my Procella a handful of times so far, it's definitely done what its intended purpose is: kept the rain off of me. It feels like a solid piece of hardware; smooth action, reliable 'clicks', seams appear well-held together. The size is perfect, too. If you had a slight figure I could see you getting literally carried away when deployed in a storm with strong winds. It's not going to turn inside-out like a lot of cheaper options, but that doesn't mean it's not going to try and take off if offered the chance to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: The best umbrella I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Excellent umbrella. This bad boy is lightweight but incredibly durable. It has stood up to 20-30mph wind, hard rain, and teenagers pushing by it on bleachers at band competitions. You could easily sell this for twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Walt

customer_reviews.title: Great product! There are only so many things you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! There are only so many things you can say about an umbrella. For one, it is well designed. I had a small umbrella that only cost me $5, but apparently it was made with poor material. The wind wreaked havoc on it and only lasted a couple of months. Procella's design aides in mitigating the negative effect of wind and is of solid construction. Great price for a great product. Also, it fits perfect in my golf bag and on my push cart.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Good size, quality, ease to open and clothes. Bought this bigger size umbrella to walk my little dog, who hates the rain. Much less money for similar styles in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: gp burns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship of the umbrella is excellent and I was surprised that there’s an auto open feature. Just press a button on the handle and bam, it pops open! Very nice handle wrapped in simulated leather for a better grip instead of just plastic like my old one. Top is vented so the wind doesn’t ruin it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiness and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional pet sitter living in South Florida, so you can imagine how much rain we get here and how windy it can be, this umbrella is amazing !!! it's very sturdy and covers a large area. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MLL

customer_reviews.title: Rain or shine
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. will be used mostly for disc golf and dog walks. Great size and seems to be good build quality. I wanted to get either a silver or gray and this was as close as I could get. I wanted a dual purpose umbrella for both sun and rain. The release system seems a little fragile so I'm careful with it when I open and close it.
customer_reviews.author: PDXborn

customer_reviews.title: Nice large umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it to do. We are having a lot of rain recently so I found myself in need of an umbrella. I haven't taken this out in winds, but it was large enough for my partner and I to share as we ran to get groceries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good golf umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It kept the rain off me and my clubs. Served it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: S&M Fournier

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use it yet, but it arrived quickly, and looks terrific. Very classy-looking. It seems well-made. If I have any actual experience using it, I'll update my review (up or down). So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy it
customer_reviews.text: Good product to good buy it. It's useful products to use in sunny day or raining day.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it says. Love this umbrella keeps me dry.
customer_reviews.author: althea

customer_reviews.title: Last less than a year...5-6 uses only.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this umbrella for just over a year now having used it 5-6 times and it's broken. Over the weekend I was using it during a soccer game and notice one of the rivets in the linkage has fallen out and now it won't collapse correctly. I expected a higher quality product and a much longer service life!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Super strong.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely solid construction. Also vented so that strong winds pass through without inverting the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He thought it was very sturdy nice umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J. Oviatt

customer_reviews.title: Solid feel
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built. Bought for golf trip, which it didn't rain this year, so could only use it for the sun - worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RGK

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction, great size for my push cart. Didn’t realize what a difference the shade makes in my enjoyment of a round of golf in hot and humid Houston
customer_reviews.author: msc_8791

customer_reviews.title: The structure and material used is awesome. Bought the large and small version of this ...
customer_reviews.text: Got sick and tired of buying cheap dept store umbrellas and then bought this one. I can’t believe the quality difference. Now I feel mad because I spent all those years buying cheap umbrellas that kept breaking. The structure and material used is awesome. Bought the large and small version of this umbrella and they are both top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Luis Guadarrama

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella arrived fast and in perfect condition. I use in everyday for about two weeks. I live in Florida and I walk 18 holes of golf everyday. I bought the silver UV umbrella to it kept the sun off and it has worked great. I feel cooler and has reduced my fatigue and I have dropped three stokes off the last five holes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Backer

customer_reviews.title: It’d a waste of money for sure .
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is trash. They sell better and cheaper ones at Walmart . I’m so upset, I finally opened it up to use it and it is flimsy. And the return window just closed . Ugh. Throwing out this piece of crap,
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella to protect from rain and sun. Great quality
customer_reviews.author: Terri Branch

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels like quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a quality umbrella. Haven't used it yet, but have it ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: Arrasmith88

customer_reviews.title: Not good for golf
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as expected, smaler and every way, will keep but use only as back up.. not a good umbrella for golfing.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Paquin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Brella
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella!!! Used it the other day in aftermath of recent hurricanes and tropical depressions and it stood up to everything!!! Looks great and is really light weight yet STRONG!!!!
customer_reviews.author: DTURMAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella with shoulder strap
customer_reviews.text: Great looking umbrella and hopefully Stay Looking great throughout the summer. Not sure how well it holds up in wind yet but as I live in Seattle area it will be tested
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella. I don't worry about the wind, and it is very light. Best umbrella I ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Dale Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Does what I want and more!
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella! Keeps me and my feet dry when walking, stays put in the wind and doubles as a sun umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Irena

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy umbrella. Been using it about 5 months here ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy umbrella. Been using it about 5 months here in Portland, OR. It's held up longer than any other umbrella I've had thusfar, particularly with the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D. Recker

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good!
customer_reviews.text: Of course as soon as I get it the rain stops but it seems to work fine!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Harper

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I’ve only used it twice but the one ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I’ve only used it twice but the one time it was down pouring and windy and the umbrella held up well. It didn’t turn inside out!!!
customer_reviews.author: amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella we use at baseball games for shade, even in wind it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love my umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I live in FL downpours happen. My umbrella works and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzys Beach House

customer_reviews.title: but you better hold on tight when the wind is strong
customer_reviews.text: Works well, stands up to very strong winds, but you better hold on tight when the wind is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Bottomley

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella; not perfect for my golf push cart as it is not long enough and I have to raise it in the holder to have it high enough for me to walk under (even with me bending slightly) and I am only 5'9".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Thanks, I have received the item was nicely packed and looking perfectly good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chua

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is of high standard. I couldn't register it because South Africa is not on your list.
customer_reviews.author: Ronelle Damant

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella. Using it for golf, both rainy and sunny
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for buck golf umbrella wont regret your purchase
customer_reviews.text: DONT FORGET TO REGISTER YOUR UMBRELLA! Best bang for buck golf umbrella wont regret your purchase. Search no more because this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy T.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this umbrella. Kept me dry in pouring rain and help up against string wind! Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kocis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great high quality umbrella for those sunny days at the soccer and baseball fields.
customer_reviews.author: el jeffe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product.Sturdy.Will recommend!Great customer service and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Vedehi Majumdar

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice in person.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking umbrella, the neighbors are jealous! Fast service, good price. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Sabine Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice umbrella. Stands up against the wind as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: jeff Marietta

customer_reviews.title: nice, big umbrella
customer_reviews.text: this is a big umbrella that seems to be sturdily built, I like that it comes with a holding sheath which makes it easier to carry
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and very secure.
customer_reviews.text: This very large umbrella is also light weight and has an excellent handle. It is very easy to hold this in the air and it does not bend easily in the wind. It opens up very easily and smooth and it is very simple to collapse and put away. It comes with a bag that you can use as a sling to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

product_meta.title: Procella Large Golf Umbrella – Award Winning, Windproof, Waterproof - Superior Heavy Duty Automatic Umbrella Defies High Wind, Sun & Rain – Perfect Cart Holder Fit – Matching Carrying Case Sleeve
product_meta.description:
PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :39 x 2 x 2 inches; 1.72 Pounds
 * Date First Available :December 13, 2016
 * Manufacturer :Procella Products
 * ASIN :B01NBK1IE3

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #16,090 in Sports & Outdoors (See Top 100 in Sports & Outdoors)  *  #22 inGolf Umbrellas 
    *  #7 inSports Fan Golf Umbrellas 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.5 out of 5 stars2,192 ratings
feature_bullets: 🏆 JUST KEEPS WINNING AWARDS! OVER 100,000+ GOLFERS AGREE, this large umbrella boasts the sleek style, brilliant convenience and powerful features you’re looking for in a windproof umbrella, from a TRUSTED COMPANY that values your relationship and guarantees your 100% SATISFACTION. [Recent awards included “BEST IN TEST” Golf Review & BEST OF THE BEST Chicago Tribune Buyers Guide].

☂️ STAY DRY – VIRTUALLY UNBREAKABLE: DON’T LET UNEXPECTED weather challenges ruin a perfectly lovely game of golf. With a REINFORCE FIBERGLASS FRAME, Tear-Resistant INNER MESH & VENTED Double Canopy Construction, this WINDPROOF, WEATHERPROOF, WATERPROOF UMBRELLA is PROVEN to defy rain, snow and winds up to 46MPH.

☂️ STAY COOL – INSTANT SHADE: Superior fabric mitigates the suns harsh rays, creating a cooling Oasis for you and your golf partner before tucking away into its 38.7 inch sleeve, fitting neatly into your trunk to keep you cool at your next FAMILY EVENT, SPORTS GAME or DAY AT THE BEACH.

☂️ AUTO OPEN – PINCH FREE CLOSE: GLIDES OPEN like a swan on the lake with a simple push of the spring-loaded button, then gently slides closed without putting your fingers at risk. The ultimate golf umbrella for women and men who prefer cutting-edge quality and comfort, WITHOUT WASTING SPACE in your GOLF BAG.

☂️ ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT (1.7LBS) - PERFECTLY FITS YOUR GOLF CART UMBRELLA HOLDER: At the weight of an extra putter set, the ERGONOMIC ANTI-SLIP umbrella handle stays securely placed in your WET HAND or golf cart umbrella holder, so while other golfers wear down their grip, you’ll still maintain your “A” game thru the 18th hole. Put it thru the paces for a full YEAR and love it or let us know and we’ll do what it takes to make it right.
